messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of this substance on Geiger counters?
It registers as a distinctive burst of radiation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the substance manifest itself with light-intensification gear?
It shows as a bright patch of luminosity.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of viewers are ineffective against this substance?
Infrared viewers are useless.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the embryo of this substance after it germinates?
The outer shell dissolves and the new creature, larva, emerges.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the source of the colours of this substance?
Colours come from the depths of space.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do adult colours create embryos?
Adult colours create embryos as harmless three-inch spheres.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the outer shell of the embryo after a few days?
The outer shell dissolves, and the new creature, a larva, emerges.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What effect does the larva have on the ecosystem?
The larva causes tremendous but unhealthy growth of local vegetation, and fruit tastes bitter.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the area previously affected by the larva after it has drained enough energy?
The area is ruined, and no plant can grow.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How large can the jellylike larva grow?
It can grow to great size.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the drained area after a colour has drained it?
The area is ruined thereafter, and no plant can grow.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where does a colour spend its daylight hours?
In dark, cool hideaways, preferably underwater: cisterns, wells, lakes, reservoirs, and oceans.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary use of a colour's Disintegrate power?
To excavate a lair underground.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the part of a colour that is solidified?
It becomes translucent. It can then manipulate objects.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average value of a colour out of space?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is generated when a colour solidifies a part of itself?
No heat is generated.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus for colours out of space?
N/A
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many attacks can a colour out of space make per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can colours be harmed by normal means?
No
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average magic points for colours out of space?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the base amount of POW for a colour, which then increases as a colour feeds?
Base amount, which then increases as a colour feeds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many hit points does the colour cost the victim when it is feeding?
1D6 hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What characteristic drain occurs when the colour is feeding?
Permanent drain of 1D10 points each of STR, CON, POW, DEX, and APP from the victim
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many attacks can an investigator make per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do Keepers allow investigators to detect a colour's presence?
By allowing Spot Hidden rolls to detect its slight glow or notice a sudden presence of ozone.
